titleStmt.title: Mr. Blount's oracles of reason examined and answered in nine sections in which his many heterodox opinions are refuted, the Holy Scriptures and revealed religion are asserted against deism & atheism / by Josiah King ...
titleStmt.author: King, Josiah.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S. Darker for Philip Bishop, bookseller ... and are to be sold by the bookseller of London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
